settings.custom_liquid:
Rosacea treatments clear your skin. Fact?
Wrong.

You thought you had found a rosacea solution but ended up getting dry, sensitive, irritated
skin. You stop using the treatment and your rosacea returns.
Usual rosacea medications don’t change the way your skin behaves. Ours does.
No dry skin, no sensitivity, no redness. Simply, the skin you deserve.
Clinically proven results. 100% natural ingredients.


★★★★★

On TrustPilot

But how?
We use red algae.The superfood for your skin.

Through extracting Astaxanthin, the bio-active compound in red algae and a powerful antioxidant. Using our innovative cold-press technology we can
preserve all the nutrients, vitamins and minerals your skin needs to improve it’s health and appearance all by itself. With zero side-effects.
Our Recovery & Repair gel is a TRANSPORTER meaning it allows much better penetration of all ingredients through the skin’s dermis and increases healthy
turnover of your cells. So instead of masking the problem, we treat it.

Title of the document

settings.heading: Astaxanthin
settings.description: Astaxanthin, the bio-active compound in red algae contains ten times more vitamin A than retinol, 6000 times more potent than vitamin C and 550 times more potent than vitamin E

settings.heading: Hylauronic acid
settings.description: Hylauronic acid dries you skin out under low humidity conditions

settings.heading: Axaleic acid
settings.description: Azaleic acid causes dryness, peeling and itching of the skin.
